Line11.BAE4: Neyrelle...I can't trust my thoughts about Mephisto, but I trust yours. Do what you think is right.
Line3.BAE4: It could work. We imprison Mephisto in the stone, get back to Lorath.
Line5.6DE47: Then we seal the gates of Hell behind us and leave Lilith here.
Line7.BD9D3: She'll catch you before you escape. And if I'm trapped in the stone when she does, she will take my power.
Line9.BD9D3: Don't let your hate for me blind you to common sense.
VoiceDir3.BAE4: Referring to Player and Neyrelle plan to capture Mephisto in a soulstone. Mulling over this possibility/plan.
